1.text: Rub dishwashing soap into the stain.

2.vid: /7/78/Get Butter out of Clothing Step 2 Version 2.360p.mp4

3.text: Pretreat the stain with prewash stain remover.
3.vid: /4/42/Get Butter out of Clothing Step 3 Version 2.360p.mp4

4.text: Wash the stained garment in the washing machine.
4.vid: /2/25/Get Butter out of Clothing Step 4 Version 2.360p.mp4

6.text: Treat the stain while it’s still fresh.
6.vid: /3/31/Get Butter out of Clothing Step 6 Version 2.360p.mp4

7.text: Lay the garment out on a flat surface.
7.vid: /9/92/Get Butter out of Clothing Step 7 Version 2.360p.mp4

8.text: Sprinkle the product onto the stain.
8.vid: /d/d0/Get Butter out of Clothing Step 8 Version 2.360p.mp4

9.text: Let the powder sit for at least 30 minutes.

10.text: Scrub the stain with an old toothbrush.
10.vid: /8/8e/Get Butter out of Clothing Step 10 Version 2.360p.mp4

11.text: Sprinkle baking soda onto the stain.

12.text: Let the baking soda sit for at least 24 hours.

13.text: Spray the area with white vinegar mixed with water.

14.text: Scrub the stain with soap and water.

15.text: Know that you’re taking a risk.

16.text: Apply the product to the stain.

17.text: Let it sit for a few minutes.

18.text: Dab the stain with a paper towel.

19.text: Wash the garment as usual in the laundry.
